name: Spraycan Rider
description:
Spraycan Raider

Use your spraycan, levers and switches to pick some shiny and yummy goods. A 64×64 pixels game made for the LowRezJam 2021.

This game was mainly inspired by Amiga games like Rick Dangerous and Gods with a twist of Lemmings.

Controls
  • Left and right key to move
  • Up to jump and climb ladder up
  • Down to climb ladder down and activate mechanisms
  • Z, C or M to spray some cheap perfume. Mummies and people with taste will run from it.
